r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * getTokens() method fixed (thanks to Alan KNowles for the bug report) * rule 'newline' now handles implicit line breaks (single newlines) in paragraphs and blockquoted text (not in lists or tables) * added rule 'break' for explicit line breaks (uses space-underscore markup) in any element (including lists and tables) * rule 'tighten' used to remove all newlines, now converts instances of 3 or more newlines to 2 newlines * re-ordered rules in Wiki.php to deal with implicit line breaks (in particular newline, break, tighten) * modified some rules to deal more gracefully with implicit line breaks (list, deflist, heading, blockquote)
